short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces new tab content with a MVP related quote.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you are building MVP (Minimal Viable Product), then these mantras will subconsciously help you align to the principles of building one. 
MVP Mantras aims to be that extension that visually helps founders, product owners, teams to keep the key mantras that one must remember while building MVP. These stem from seasoned minds who have been there, done that. 

With MVP Mantras, you will be motivated to see new quotes displayed every time you open a new tab playing a small role in your everyday life. 

üì¶ FEATURES

As an MVP should be, this chrome extension too just has the simplest feature focusing on its customer job. 

- Displays a new MVP quote, every time you open a new tab from seasoned entrepreneurs
- Visually pleasant and is made with pure love towards building MVPs for over a decade
- Ability to add quick links to access them on the tab

‚úâÔ∏è FEEDBACK & REPORTS
